title: After spending a day identifying... I need help.
content:
Hi Everyone.

I am looking for a font similar to the one attached for producing a logo.  
I kind of need the whole alphabet to building is not an option for me...

Does anyone know if there is a similar font to on on the weights?

Thanks in advance,  
Bas

author: Bastiaan

comments.content: Your sample shows two distinct typefaces, not one...
